query:
SELECT 
  id, 
  uniqueId, 
  title, 
  templateStatus,
  isPublic,
  documentRequired,
  LENGTH(superprompt) as superprompt_length,
  LENGTH(variableSchema) as variables_length,
  SUBSTRING(superprompt, 1, 300) as superprompt_preview
FROM taskTemplates 
WHERE uniqueId IN ('SP-2026-001', 'SP-2026-003', 'SP-2026-004', 'SP-2026-006', 'SP-2026-007')
   OR title = 'Vertrag prüfen'
ORDER BY uniqueId;
command:

  id, 
  uniqueId, 
  title, 
  templateStatus,
  isPublic,
  documentRequired,
  LENGTH(superprompt) as superprompt_length,
  LENGTH(variableSchema) as variables_length,
  SUBSTRING(superprompt, 1, 300) as superprompt_preview
FROM taskTemplates 
WHERE uniqueId IN ('SP-2026-001', 'SP-2026-003', 'SP-2026-004', 'SP-2026-006', 'SP-2026-007')
   OR title = 'Vertrag prüfen'
ORDER BY uniqueId;
